Zuck is a cuck! Elon Musk escalates his war of words with Mark Zuckerberg over 'protecting brand speech' on his new Threads app ahead of their Las Vegas cage fight - after threatening to SUE him
09/07/23 06:10
Replying to screenshots of Zuckerberg, 39, laughing at burger chain Wendy's telling him to go into space to 'really make Musk mad' the Tesla CEO simply replied: 'Zuck is a cuck'. Musk, 52, and fellow tech billionaires Zuckerberg have seen tensions rise after they agreed to take each other on in a cage fight. In what became a viral back-and-forth, Musk tweeted on June 20 bragging that he was 'up for a cage match if he is', to which the Meta boss responded on Instagram 'send me the location'. Zuckerberg broke his decade-long Twitter silence by tweeting a Spider-Man meme to make the launch of Threads.
